import React from 'react'; import { useWishlist } from './WishlistContext'; const OffcanvasWishlist = ({ isOpen, closeOffcanvas }) => { const { wishlistItems, removeFromWishlist } = useWishlist(); return (
Wishlist
    {wishlistItems.map((item) => (
  • {item.name} 1 x ${Number(item.price).toFixed(2)}
    • ))}
view wishlist
); }; export default OffcanvasWishlist;
